price: ߛߊߣߌ߲ߧߊ ߓߍ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߡߊ߬ߙߊ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߓߟߏ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߠߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna alladhī biyadihi malakūtu kulli shayin wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
